## Shape.LinkedCell property

获取或设置链接到控件值的工作表范围。

```csharp
public string LinkedCell { get; set; }
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.LinkedCell.Equals("$B$6"))
    shape.LinkedCell = "A1";
```
